rating_comment:
Baikuntha stay will remain memorable for a number of reasons.
1.Place is fabulously done with an eye for every minute detail
2.Spotless washrooms,linens,comforters and towels in adequate quantities (everything was laundry cleaned)
3.Lip smacking food
4.Serene and green surroundings
5.Well equipped music system and lots of indoor games to keep everyone engaged
6.Beautiful gardens all around the property
7.Lastly the hosts.
Rohit and his parents were exceptionally brilliant making our stay pleasant and homely.
Only regret was the short duration .
Highly recommended .
We will surely revisit.
